name: ARC Logo > peasant home (for Tumblr)
description: For those of you ARCadians who just don't like the peasant home.

user.name: frodoismyenergydrink
user.about:
I don't know how to create styles, and I don't know how to do code, but I will try my best when my fandoms are in need!
Also, I don't understand the Creative Commons License(like, okay, I understand that's it's all legal stuff, but I don't want to figure out which one I need) basically, do whatever you want. I don't care. you don't have to credit me. Simply, enjoy.

additional_info:
Sorry about this, I know it's not the best, but I hope you all like it! 
Um, obviously I am in no way associated with the ARC, and am simply a lover of Primeval.
All you need to do is install Stylish, then you can install this.
If you're interested, my blog is frodoismyenergydrink.tumblr.com.
(PS anomaly coming soon, just give me some time. It's going to be harder to make.)
